humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the 'SIZE OF TUMOR: Maximum dimension invasive component: 6.0 cm'. Based on the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor is measured to be 6.0 cm (B). According to the TNM staging system, a T3 stage is assigned to tumors that are greater than 5 cm in size. Therefore, the patient's cancer stage is T3.
